content: this pattern is for your personal use and the contents are my original work do not share any portions of this pattern in any form for others to use you are 100% free to sell any physical items made with this pattern please tag me @womanwalkingawire in any social media posts of items made with this pattern or link the pattern i would love for you to join my facebook group if you aren t already a member @ alternative crochet all my social and shop links can be found here linktr ee/womanwalkingawire message me with any questions at any time of day i usually respond within 24 hours enjoy notes chains between stitches do not count as stitches they are chain spaces chsp for rounds with new colors i use standing stitches if you prefer to begin a round with a chain of equivalent height treble_crochet=ch4 double_crochet=ch3 half_double_crochet=ch2 etc always count your chain as your 1st stitch except for ch1 s with a 4mm hook and worsted weight yarn my squares come out approximately 5 ½ x 5 ½ inches unblocked i recommend doing a test square to gauge how big yours will be as sizes vary with different yarn brands and colors even if the colors are all the same brand and weight recommended resources bella coco has a tutorial on making a magic_ring or magic_ring https //youtu be/j7ghtfxaz2e crystalsandcrochet has a tutorial on youtube about how to make standing stitches https //youtu be/wy0me0npuog also a tutorial on invisible joins for chain and standing stitches to prevent lumpy spots and lessen seam lines on your project https //youtu be/vovi8duekqw ©2023 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 1 abbreviations materials round round 4 colors worsted weight yarn magic_ring magic_ring 4mm hook chain chain scissors st s -
